snippet.title: Melpool Land [メルプールランド] Game Sample -- PC-98
snippet.description:
Melpool Land is such a pointless "fighting" game...can't believe that Compile made games like this. You have cute looking characters, cool music, and...that's it. As you can see in this video, the CPU is an absolute joke and there only seems to be one attack. You can destroy the CPU's weapons (which you often do first, leaving them nearly helpless). You can also bump them into holes...very easily. You just spam attack and they're done for.

Game is short too; beat it in this video easily.

Enjoy.
